name: ai-sdk-ui
description: Build React chat interfaces with Vercel AI SDK v6. Covers v6 stable (agent integration, tool approval, message parts structure, auto-submit), v5→v6 migration, useChat/useCompletion/useObject hooks, and 12 UI error solutions (stream parsing, stale body values, React update depth). Use when: implementing AI SDK v6 chat UIs, migrating v5→v6, troubleshooting useChat failed to parse stream, useChat no response, or stale body values errors, or building AI chat interfaces. <div key={m.id}>{m.conten
